com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class CollapsibleContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.CollapsibleContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Toggleable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorComponent, DraggableContainer

    public class CollapsibleContainer
extends FocusableComponent
implements Toggleable
    Container that can be closed and scrolled, so that its children can be hidden.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int childHeight
      Cached combined height of children.
      protected Container container
      Container containing the children.

      Cached container scroll height.

      Toggleable indicating whether the container is open or closed.
      protected boolean scroll
      Cached value of whether scrolling is happening.
      protected int scrollPosition
      Current scroll offset.
      protected Toggleable toggle
      Toggleable that can be toggled by the user.
